title: Who is the most incredibly talented musician that never became popular? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on what you deem popular as some artists/groups are popular in some countries and not know at all outside their native countries. Animal collective are quite unknown in the UK but known in the US. Id put them forward The Maccabees where known in the UK but outside the UK they were little known It goes the same with Foals. Little known outside the UK but very talented This routine is hell (now called Swain) are unknown outside NL Tom Vek is a great UK musician and hardly known anywhere Zomby, known in the UK but not outside of it Team sleep - not known in many countries but where a “supergroup” and excellent musicians Pinback - Little known in the US and worldwide The Cribs - Little know in the UK or any other country UNKLE - little known in all countries Woodkid - Little known outside of France Shabazz Palaces - Little known in the Hip Hop community Czarface - Little known everywhere but awesome Hip Hop, contains inspectah deck from wu tang Young fathers - should be better known everywhere 65daysofstatic - A great instrumental math rock band from the UK Tokyo Police Club - Great indie band from the UK Battles - Little known anywhere and contains one of the best drummers in the world - John Stanier Random Axe - A Hip Hop “supergroup” from detroit Black Milk - Not very unknown outside of Detroit Guilty Simpson - Another Detroit rapper that goes under the radar except certain parts on the US, inc. Detroit. Will haven - A metal band from the US, but little known. Even though they are seen as pioneers in that type of metal by artists in Cali Africa Hitech - A talented electro type group from the UK. Kind of disappeared after their debut, but still going Moderat - unknown outside the electro community in some countries. hail from germany and made up of Apparat and Modeselector Apparat - A german electro producer, makes amazing music Modeselektor - Not very popular outide germany, both apparat and modeselektor are from berlin Idles - An alt roc/punk band from bristol. Pretty recent and make amazing music. Fudge tunnel - A metal band from nottingham, UK which made groundbreaking noise rock/metal. Includes the now talented producer Alex newport The good, the bad, the queen - a supergroup including damon album and former verve and the cash members. Throwing Snow - A UK future dubstep/electro producer which has been commissioned by adidas , impulse and various DVDs I think that is enough for now. As you can see i like vast types of music which doesn't get the attention it deserves.

T hat’s pretty subjective, but one of the best singer songwriters, who wrote a lot of hits for other artists, but never really became big herself was:  Laura Nyro wrote songs that became hits for Three Dog Night,Blood Sweat and Tears, The 5th dimension, and Barbra Streisand. She was very talented, and a great singer herself, as well as a great Pianist. She never really wanted to be a big star and suffered from stage fright, preferring to play small clubs rather than Stadiums, She died fairly young at age 49. taken from us way too early. I always though she should have been more widely recognized.
